item.title: Creating Snippets
item.description: Topic originally suggested by Jack Penzer, Data Scientist The Problem As bona fide coders we love efficiency, consistency, and reproducibility. In the same way functions enable us to automate common tasks within R in a more reliable way than copy-and-pasting, Code Snippets enable us to quickly insert snippets of code. What are Code Snippets? Code snippets are templates of small regions of re-usable code, that enable us to enter repeating code patterns easily with consistency.
